name: AddProspectLanguageAbility
description:
Add language abilities for a prospect in Workday.

Use this tool to add language abilities for a specific prospect in Workday by specifying their language ID, abilities, and ability type. Suitable for both single and bulk additions, supporting up to 100 instances in one request.

parameters.name: prospect_workday_id
parameters.description: The unique Workday ID of the prospect for whom the language ability is being added.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: prospect_language_data
parameters.description: A JSON object or collection of objects detailing prospect language abilities. Includes required fields like language.id, abilities, and abilities.abilityType. For bulk operations, ensure data is in an array format.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Workday API

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

value_schema.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
